definition: to understand/to comprehend the ultimate essence of things (Buddhism)
to enter/to go into/to join/to become a member of/to confirm or agree with/abbr. for 入聲|入声[ru4 sheng1]

sentences.english: You really have to pro-aware into, called enlightenment.
sentences.chinese: 你真正要亲悟入，叫证悟。

definition: actual situation/the ultimate essence of things (Buddhism)
Dharma (the teachings of the Buddha)/Buddhist doctrine
variant of 思維|思维[si1 wei2]

the Four Noble Truths (Budd.), namely: all life is suffering 苦, the cause of suffering is desire 集, emancipation comes only by eliminating passions 滅|灭, the way 道 to emancipation is the Eight-fold Noble Way 八正道/also called 四諦|四谛
Hinayana, the Lesser Vehicle/Buddhism in India before the Mayahana sutras/also pr. [Xiao3 cheng2]
Buddha-like heart (full of compassion)/spirit of Buddha (awakened to reality and no longer clinging to appearances)
to transmit Buddhist teaching/chakram or chakka (throwing disk)
